MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL19 postcode area of Prestatyn, affecting properties in Pendre Avenue and surrounding areas. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the complexity of the repair needed to our underground cable network and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10 PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at  5:32 PM  on 13th November 2020..
